meanings.definition: Covered in or containing the most silt.
meanings.sent1: The riverbank was the siltiest spot along the water.
meanings.sent2: After the flood, the siltiest areas were near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The siltiest mud made it hard for the ducks to waddle through.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like the siltiest soil, full of hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The siltiest layer settled at the bottom of the jar, undisturbed.

meanings.sent1: The siltiest samples from the excavation site were carefully analyzed.
meanings.sent2: The siltiest sediment was found in the deepest part of the lake.
meanings.sent3: The siltiest fabric felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a siltiest tone, deep and muffled.
meanings.sent5: The siltiest clouds hung low in the sky, promising rain.
